categories.title: Recent ElizaOS GitHub Pull Requests Summary

content.text:
# New Features

Several new features have been added to ElizaOS:

- OpenAI TTS (Text-to-Speech) functionality was implemented in two related PRs (#4255 and #4259)
- A new message API was introduced (#4247)
- Message buttons feature was added to enhance user interaction (#4187)
- The missing bootstrap plugin was added to the list (#4267)

# Bug Fixes

Several bugs were addressed:

- Fixed plugin installation priority order (#4256)
- Replaced a deprecated vision model (#4254)
- Moved initialization after adapter.init in runtime (#4253)
- Removed duplicate declaration in api.ts (#4246)
- Fixed a cyclic error issue (#4266)
- Fixed Discord voice join/leave action (#4265)
- Made small fixes to Discord actions (#4264)

# Other Improvements

Other improvements and changes include:

- Added a reflections agent that asks other deployed agents how it's doing (#4257)
- Improved CLI and start code (#4250)
- Updated CLI to use console log for non-error cases (#4248)
- Removed dead code around plugin installation (#4263)
- Replaced text input with dropdown for voice model selection (#4262)

categories.title: Recent Pull Requests in the elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text: Several improvements have been made to the elizaOS/eliza repository through recent pull requests. Samarthsinghal28 added instrumentation functionality in PR #4261, while Y4NK33420 replaced text input with a dropdown for voice model selection in PR #4262.

Developer wtfsayo made several contributions to improve the CLI and code structure. These include using console log for non-error cases (PR #4248), improving CLI and start code (PR #4250), fixing plugin install priority order (PR #4256), and removing dead code around plugin installation (PR #4263).

Developer tcm390 addressed several Discord-related issues with three pull requests: fixing Discord actions (PR #4264), resolving a cyclic error (PR #4266), and fixing Discord voice join/leave actions (PR #4265).

categories.title: Recent GitHub Issues in elizaOS/eliza Repository

content.text:
Several issues have been reported in the elizaOS/eliza GitHub repository:

1. Discord Client Issues:
   - Issue #4258: The Discord client is not loading when using the 'pnpm start' command.
   - Issue #4269: Discord doesn't reply when deployed with Docker on Google Cloud Run.

2. Plugin Functionality:
   - Issue #4251: The Anthropic plugin (@elizaos/plugin-anthropic@1.0.0-beta.28) is not registering for TEXT_EMBEDDING functionality.

3. Documentation and Feature Requests:
   - Issue #4260: A request to update the community section of the documentation.
   - Issue #2919: A feature request to implement Reranked Contextual Embedding + cBM25 as the default RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) implementation, referencing an Anthropic blog post.

Over the past two days (April 10-12, 2025), the elizaos/eliza repository showed significant development activity. The project had a total of 19 new pull requests, with 17 of them successfully merged. There were also 5 new issues created during this period. The repository maintained strong community engagement with 14 active contributors on April 10-11, which decreased slightly to 10 active contributors on April 11-12.
sources: From 2025-04-10 to 2025-04-11, elizaos/eliza had 13 new PRs (11 merged), 4 new issues, and 14 active contributors.
From 2025-04-11 to 2025-04-12, elizaos/eliza had 6 new PRs (6 merged), 1 new issues, and 10 active contributors.
